snippet.title: Shortstacked | NEW Student Game Trailer Reveal | #USCGamesEXPO 2020
snippet.description:
Shortstacked will be featured at USC Games 2020 Expo on May 12th!

Team up with a friend in couch co-op to skip school and go on wild adventures! But be careful: to get past adults and the mean ole “Ocifer,” one of you will have to stand on the other’s shoulders to look like a trench coat-wearing adult. You’re short, but can you stack?

Check out our trailer & demo our game at USC Games Expo 2020 on May 12th!

Website: https://www.shortstackedgame.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/shortstackedgame/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/shortstackedgame/

RSVP for USC Games Expo 2020!
https://www.eventbrite.com/e/usc-games-expo-2020-tickets-101822142770

✦✦

Visit us on our other socials!
▶Twitter: @uscgames 
▶Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/uscgames/
▶Instagram: @usc.games
▶Our Website: games.usc.edu

✦✦

ABOUT USC GAMES:
Recognized as the #1 game design program in North America by the Princeton Review, USC Games represents an exciting collaboration between the School of Cinematic Arts’ Interactive Media & Games Division and the Viterbi School of Engineering’s Department of Computer Science. Incorporating elements of design, artistry, and engineering, USC Games offers an utterly unique educational experience for students and serves as the launching pad for them to play significant roles in the game design field. 
https://games.usc.edu
